name: owner_name
description: Repo owner name

name: matched_name
description: Repo name, as matched in search over CSET corpora (use to join on other tables)

name: current_name
description: Current repo name

name: used_by
description: Number of projects that use this repo - this is self-reported, not always listed, and almost certainly an undercount in general

name: num_commits
description: Number of commits, as reported on the homepage of the repo. May be a range like 5000+

name: readme_text
description: Raw markdown of readme

name: network_count
description: Number of forks in the network (e.g. of ancestor repos), example: https://github.com/mariru/dynamic_bernoulli_embeddings/network/members

name: forks_count
description: Number of direct forks

name: allow_forking
description: If true, repo can be forked

name: open_issues_count
description: Number of open issues

name: disabled
description: True if repository is disabled

name: has_wiki
description: True if repository has a wiki

name: has_projects
description: True if repository has projects

name: primary_programming_language
description: Primary programming language of project, as reported on repo list views like https://github.com/georgetown-cset

name: watchers_count
description: Number of watchers

name: topics
description: Repo's topic tags

name: stargazers_count
description: Number of stars

name: subscribers_count
description: Number of watchers

name: homepage
description: URL of external homepage

name: updated_at
description: Time the repo was last updated (see: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/15918588/github-api-v3-what-is-the-difference-between-pushed-at-and-updated-at)

name: id
description: Repo's github id

name: has_pages
description: True if has github pages site

name: size
description: Size of the repo, in kilobytes

name: created_at
description: Time when the repo was created (see: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/15918588/github-api-v3-what-is-the-difference-between-pushed-at-and-updated-at)

name: archived
description: True if repo is archived

name: open_issues
description: Number of open issues (open pull requests are included in this count)

name: default_branch
description: Name of the default branch

name: fork
description: True if this repo is a fork

name: is_template
description: True if this repo is a template

name: description
description: User-provided short description of the repo

name: pushed_at
description: Time of last pushed commit (see: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/15918588/github-api-v3-what-is-the-difference-between-pushed-at-and-updated-at)

name: node_id
description: Github node id of repo

name: has_issues
description: False if repo does not have issues enabled

name: sources
description: Where CSET found the repo. For scholarly lit, one of 'title+abstract' (of merged scholarly lit), 'pwc' (as extracted by pwc), 'cnki' (fulltext), 'arxiv' (fulltext); for topic queries, 'topic: <name of the topic>'

name: num_releases
description: Number of releases

name: num_contributors
description: Number of contributors. May be a range, like 5,000+

name: fork_of
description: Repo this repo was directly forked from, if forked

name: ultimate_fork_of
description: Ultimate parent repo of this repo, if forked
